manager

Class ForceFieldManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • manager.ForceFieldManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class ForceFieldManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    Force field manager makes sure that Generates within eachother's range create a force field. Each force field in turn is notified after an action.
    Author:
    Dieter Castel, Jonas Devlieghere, Vincent Reniers and Stefan Pante

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ForceFieldManager(Grid grid)
      Instantiates the Force Field manager with a reference to the grid.

      Creats a forceField between two given coordinates.

      Find the locations of force fields.

      • addForceField

        protected void addForceField(ForceField forceField)
                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Adds a force field to the collection.
        Parameters:
        forceField -
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Throws an exception if the force field is already contained.

      • canHaveAsForceField

        protected boolean canHaveAsForceField(ForceField forceField)
        Checks if the force field can be added to the collection.
        Parameters:
        forceField - the forcefield to be checked
        Returns:
        False If the force field is null or already contained. True Otherwise

      • getAllForceFields

        protected java.util.ArrayList<ForceField> getAllForceFields()
        Returns a new arrayList with the references to the force fields.

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
          java.lang.Object arg)
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer

      • detectForceFields

        protected void detectForceFields()
        Find the locations of force fields. If there are two generators within eachother's range, we check if there should be a new force field between them.

      • createForceFieldBetween

        protected void createForceFieldBetween(Coordinate coordinate,
                           Coordinate coordinateToCheck)
        Creats a forceField between two given coordinates.
        Parameters:
        coordinate - the first coordinate.
        coordinateToCheck - the second coordinate.
